div.p: Doctor Thadeus is annually allocated 12 bushels of grain, 40 guilders, and in the autumn collectively 8 barrels of wine from the provost's division.
And now on Wednesday, he is given 3 bushels of grain, 10 guilders, and 3 barrels of wine from the year 1564. Your willing godfather Bernhard Spr√ºngli.
